Ai Automatrix Playground

Custom AI | Integrations | Automation

My Expertise

Empowering businesses through AI, automation, and seamless integrations. With expertise in cutting-edge tools like Botpress, AWS, and OpenAI, I craft innovative solutions that drive growth and efficiency.

At AI Automatrix, we specialize in developing and deploying custom ChatGPT4o bots tailored to your unique needs. Our bots come equipped with diverse capabilities, thanks to our expertise in creating custom plugins, web integrations, and automation solutions. Each bot is designed to interact seamlessly with you and your environment, leveraging the latest cutting-edge technology from OpenAI and the Botpress LLMz Engine. Our passionate team at AI Automatrix is dedicated to delivering personalized software solutions that push the boundaries of what's possible in AI.

🔥 What I Bring to the Table

I build autonomous, intelligent systems that combine AI, automation, and human-like reasoning to tackle real-world problems across finance, marketing, research, and customer service. These systems aren’t just tools — they’re collaborative digital agents that evolve with your goals.

💡 7 Core Areas of Value I Offer

  • 1. AI-Powered Problem Solving: Autonomous agents that work like digital employees — handling research, analysis, customer service, and planning, even overnight.
  • 2. Smart Web Experiences: Sites that don’t just look good, but think — from chatbots to live quoting tools and schedulers.
  • 3. Automation & Workflow Systems: Seamlessly integrated backend workflows that run without human input — handling data, form submissions, bot memory, and more.
  • 4. Finance & Trading Intelligence: Custom GPT tools for analyzing trades, creating Pine Script indicators, and simulating paper trading with real market data.
  • 5. Research & Reporting Agents: AI that compiles deep market or customer research reports, executes toolchains, and gives opinions based on facts it finds.
  • 6. Custom Software Development: Advanced app creation — from game physics to live data dashboards and GPT-driven apps.
  • 7. AI Education & Empowerment: Helping creators, startups, and teams use AI to multiply their output, rethink workflows, and build better tools.

Design

Transform your audience’s experience with engaging and intuitive designs. From static HTML/CSS to modern interfaces, our designs breathe life into your brand. Elevate your brand's presence with visuals that inspire and captivate.

Code

From dynamic front-end interfaces to scalable backend solutions, our coding expertise in JavaScript, Node.js, and cutting-edge tools like Botpress and OpenAI ensures robust performance and seamless functionality.

Tools

Our toolset includes Git for version control, AWS for cloud deployment, Botpress for automation, and Kucoin for cryptocurrency integrations. Experience seamless workflows with the latest technologies at your fingertips.

What You Get

Our comprehensive package includes:

  • A modern, Replit-style business website.
  • Custom AI chatbot integration for customer support.
  • Basic SEO optimization.
  • Assistance with initial marketing campaign setup.

Get everything you need to launch your online presence and enhance customer interaction.

Services Portfolio

Below is our end-to-end suite of offerings, organized by category.

1. AI Solutions

We offer modular AI services—each can be mixed and matched or bundled into larger custom solutions:

Predictive Analytics

Use Cases:

  • Customer churn prediction
  • Demand forecasting
  • Sales pipeline scoring

Deliverables:

  • Data pipeline (ETL) scripts
  • Trained model with metrics report (accuracy, precision, recall)
  • REST API endpoint (e.g., POST /predict-churn)

Deployment Options:

  • Cloud (AWS SageMaker, GCP AI Platform)
  • On-premise containers (Docker + Kubernetes)

Recommendation Engines

Use Cases:

  • E-commerce product recommendations
  • Content suggestions for blogs/resources
  • Personalized marketing offers

Deliverables:

  • Collaborative filtering or hybrid recommendation model
  • Real-time API (`GET /recommendations?user_id=12345`)
  • A/B testing framework

Integration Points:

  • Shopify, WooCommerce, Magento, custom CRMs

NLP Chatbots & Virtual Assistants

Use Cases:

  • Customer support chatbots (answer FAQs, route to agents)
  • Lead qualification bots (ask qualifying questions, schedule demos)
  • Internal knowledge assistants (help employees retrieve SOPs)

Deliverables:

  • Dialog flows defined in Botpress
  • Integration with Messenger, WhatsApp, website webchat
  • Analytics dashboard (conversation logs, intent performance)

Computer Vision

Use Cases:

  • Quality control (defect detection in manufacturing)
  • Inventory counting (shelf scanning, object detection)
  • Document digitization (OCR and data extraction)

Deliverables:

  • Trained detection or classification model
  • Inference pipeline (e.g., AWS Lambda function triggered by S3 upload)
  • Example integration (e.g., Python script for batch image processing)

Custom AI Modules (Advanced/Niche)

Examples:

  • Time-series anomaly detection (IoT data)
  • Sentiment analysis for social media monitoring
  • Speech-to-text transcription pipelines

Deliverables:

  • End-to-end training notebooks
  • Deployment scaffolding (Docker, CI/CD scripts)

2. Website Development

We design, develop, and deploy responsive, high-performance websites that align with brand and business goals.

Basic Informational Sites

Ideal For: Local businesses, small service providers (plumbers, lawyers, consultants).

Includes:

  • Up to 5 pages (Home, About, Services, Blog, Contact)
  • Mobile-friendly responsive design
  • Contact form with spam protection

Technology Options:

  • Static (Next.js / Gatsby)
  • CMS-driven (WordPress, Ghost)

E-commerce Sites

Ideal For: Retailers, subscription boxes, small online stores.

Includes:

  • Product catalog (up to 50 SKUs as part of the base package)
  • Shopping cart + secure checkout (Stripe, PayPal)
  • Inventory management integration

Platform Options:

  • Shopify (hosted)
  • WooCommerce (self-hosted WordPress)
  • Custom React + Node.js stack

Custom Web Applications

Ideal For: Businesses needing more complex functionality (CRM portals, booking systems, dashboards).

Includes:

  • Full-stack architecture (React/Vue frontend, Node.js/Python backend)
  • Role-based authentication/authorization
  • Database (PostgreSQL, MongoDB)

Examples:

  • Employee training portal
  • Client dashboard with analytics charts
  • Appointment scheduling system

Design & UX Services

Deliverables:

  • Wireframes (Figma, Adobe XD)
  • High-fidelity mockups
  • Interactive prototypes

Focus Areas:

  • Brand consistency (fonts, colors)
  • Accessibility (WCAG 2.1 AA compliance)
  • Conversion-optimized layouts

3. SEO & Digital Marketing

We help clients improve organic visibility, drive qualified traffic, and convert visitors into customers.

On-Page SEO

Deliverables:

  • Title tags, meta descriptions, and header tag optimization
  • Keyword research & mapping (per page)
  • Content recommendations (keyword placement, internal linking)

Tools Used:

  • Ahrefs API, SEMrush API, Google Search Console

Technical SEO

Deliverables:

  • XML sitemap generation & submission
  • robots.txt configuration
  • Page speed optimization (image compression, minification)
  • Schema markup implementation (JSON-LD for local business, products, articles)

Tools Used:

  • Lighthouse, Screaming Frog, Google PageSpeed Insights

Off-Page SEO & Link Building

Deliverables:

  • Guest post outreach (10 prospects/month)
  • Directory submissions (industry-specific lists)
  • Backlink monitoring & disavow list management

Tools Used:

  • Ahrefs, Moz Link Explorer

Content Marketing & Strategy

Deliverables:

  • Blog editorial calendar (12 topics/quarter)
  • High-quality blog posts (1,000–1,500 words, optimized)
  • Infographics and downloadable assets (eBooks, whitepapers)

Focus Areas:

  • Thought leadership (industry insights)
  • Long-tail keyword targeting
  • Social media amplification

4. Maintenance & Support (Retainer Packages)

We offer tiered monthly retainers to keep your site, SEO, and AI solutions running smoothly.

Package Hours/Month Included Services Covered SLA (Response Time) Monthly Fee
Bronze 5 - Basic website updates
- On-Page SEO tweaks
- AI model health check (monthly)		 48-hour response (M-F) $1,200
Silver 10 - All Bronze services
- Technical SEO fixes
- Monthly AI retraining (if data available)
- Minor feature enhancements (website/AI)		 24-hour response (M-F) $2,000
Gold 20 - All Silver services
- Off-Page SEO/link-building (5 links/mo)
- Quarterly AI performance audit
- Priority dev hours for new features		 12-hour response (M-F) $3,000

Notes:

  • Overage Hours: $150/hour (Bronze), $140/hour (Silver), $130/hour (Gold).
  • SLAs do not cover major new feature development (quoted separately).
  • Retainer can be paused with 30 days’ notice; unused hours expire monthly (non-rollover).

Company Profile & Mission Statement

History / Founding Story

AI Business Solutions was founded in 2022 by a small team of AI researchers and full‐stack developers who saw a gap in the market: many small-to‐midsize businesses (SMBs) wanted to harness AI, modern websites, and SEO but lacked the internal expertise to get started.

  • Founding Year: 2022
  • Founders:
    • Garret Friesen (4 year Intelligent Systems Developer, creating AI-driven solutions that power real-world automation.)

In our first year, we built proof-of-concept AI prototypes for local retailers (predictive inventory models) and launched half-dozen WordPress websites optimized for mobile. By the end of 2023, we expanded into offering end-to-end digital solutions—combining AI, custom website development, and SEO—under one roof.

Mission & Vision

  • Mission:

    Empower SMBs to compete and grow by making cutting-edge AI, modern website design, and data-driven SEO accessible, affordable, and easy to implement.

  • Vision:

    To be the go-to partner for SMBs worldwide who want to modernize operations, attract more customers online, and leverage AI insights—without needing an in-house data science or dev team.

Core Values

  1. Customer-First:
    • We put our clients’ needs, feedback, and success at the center of everything we do.
    • We listen first, then design solutions that align with their goals and budgets.
  2. Innovation:
    • We stay ahead of industry trends—constantly researching new AI models, web frameworks, and SEO best practices.
    • We encourage experimentation and iterative improvements.
  3. Transparency:
    • We provide clear, itemized proposals and explain technical concepts in plain language.
    • We maintain open communication throughout every project phase—no hidden fees, no black-box pricing.
  4. Integrity:
    • We deliver on our promises. If something goes wrong, we own it, fix it promptly, and learn from it.
    • We adhere to data privacy and security best practices (e.g., GDPR/CCPA compliance).
  5. Collaboration:
    • We work as partners with our clients, fostering a collaborative environment and sharing progress at every step.
    • We believe cross-functional teamwork (AI engineers + designers + marketers) yields better results.
